comment.body:
When I follow the Linux installation instructions, running "make" gives the following error:

	pattern.c:32:10: fatal error: 'pcre.h' file not found

> [3x71nc7](#comment_3_1Q8iqH31cKCqynoJRxR2PfJhzQr8wHdiHr): Did you install libprec3?

Can't run apt-get on Mac, have to use brew, and it doesn't recognize libssl-dev or libpcre3-dev. Instead I installed the package pcre and then it worked.
